nodes.text: Koopla Nanuk was an individual who hosted a broadcast of the Annual Batuu Holochess Tournament on radio station BSO 401.72. The broadcast was played in Black Spire Outpost during the war between the First Order and the Resistance.
Koopla Nanuk was first created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. The character is not present in the park, but can be heard.
